author: Epic Games
description:
Trust your senses, ready your blade.
Hell is Us is available now! Play with the exclusive Black and Gold skin for Remi and his drone. The skin is automatically available in-game, only when purchasing Hell is Us on the Epic Games Store. https://epic.gm/hell-is-us

The game features no quest markers or magical compass. Without those artificial aids, it relies on organic exploration and gives back players the freedom to uncover its story on their own.
You are Remi and as you set foot in Hadea, the only thing you recall is that your father was the blacksmith of a village named Jova. But the search for your past may bind your destiny to Hadea in ways you never expected. You are now part of it.
title: Hell Is Us | Launch Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
The world’s most-played mobile MOBA is available now on Epic Games Store for Android. 

Team up for the ultimate 5v5 hero battles in Honor of Kings and check out some of our tips and tricks! https://epic.gm/HoK-guide
title: Honor of Kings | Available on Epic Games Store for Android
